api_list.name: Brazilian Meteorologic Stations
api_list.description: Geolocation of all meteorologic stations in Brazil
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://location-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/brazil-meteo-stations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "location-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://location-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/brazil-meteo-stations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "location-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
